Description: Five nice sized bedrooms and one smaller bedroom. Two bedrooms in attic, one on first floor and three on lower level with it's own entrance. Two baths. All utilities included. Large back-yard with covered patio. Garage rented separately. Street parking. Five blocks from campus. Will provide a 10% discount on rent if full house is rented before March 15, 2014. Separate rooms can be rented if whole house can't be rented. $450 per month for larger bedrooms and $350 per month for smaller bedroom. Prefer to rent the whole house to one group.
